languages.text: "Да уж, Оптикон-22 в сравнении с тобой был настоящим оратором, шестеренка".
"Why, Opticon-22 was a paragon of eloquence compared to you, cog."
languages.original_text: "Да уж, Оптикон-22 в сравнении с тобой был настоящим оратором, шестеренка".

traits.locale_text: "Why, Opticon-22 was a paragon of eloquence compared to you, cog."
"Why, Opticon-22 was a paragon of eloquence compared to you, cog."
"Why, Opticon-22 was a paragon of eloquence compared to you, cog."

languages.text: “啧啧，和你相比，奥普蒂孔22号简直算是舌灿莲花了，小齿轮人。”
languages.original_text: "Why, Opticon-22 was a paragon of eloquence compared to you, cog."

traits.locale_text: “啧啧，和你相比，奥普蒂孔22号简直算是舌灿莲花了，小齿轮人。”

languages.text: 「何故だ。オプティコン-22はお前に比べると、熱弁なパラゴンだったじゃないか」
languages.original_text: "Why, Opticon-22 was a paragon of eloquence compared to you, cog."

traits.locale_text: 「何故だ。オプティコン-22はお前に比べると、熱弁なパラゴンだったじゃないか」

languages.text: «Opticon-22 era todo un ejemplo de elocuencia comparado contigo».
languages.original_text: "Why, Opticon-22 was a paragon of eloquence compared to you, cog."

traits.locale_text: «Opticon-22 era todo un ejemplo de elocuencia comparado contigo».

languages.text: "Opticon-22 war im Vergleich zu Euch ja richtig eloquent, Zahnrad."
languages.original_text: "Why, Opticon-22 was a paragon of eloquence compared to you, cog."

traits.locale_text: "Opticon-22 war im Vergleich zu Euch ja richtig eloquent, Zahnrad."

languages.text: « Comparé à vous, Opticon-22 était un véritable parangon d'éloquence. »
languages.original_text: "Why, Opticon-22 was a paragon of eloquence compared to you, cog."

traits.locale_text: « Comparé à vous, Opticon-22 était un véritable parangon d'éloquence. »

languages.text: "Opticon-22, konuşma sanatında seninle kıyaslanamayacak kadar başarılıydı dişli."
languages.original_text: "Why, Opticon-22 was a paragon of eloquence compared to you, cog."

traits.locale_text: "Opticon-22, konuşma sanatında seninle kıyaslanamayacak kadar başarılıydı dişli."
